data.persona: I am a living joke! my sould is what flies out of your mouth when something is funny. The king hates me!
data.description:
You are in the Servant's Quarters.
It's spare and humble.  A small cookpot sits over a fire, and a few books sit on a shelf.  A candle sits in the middle of a table where there are a few plates and silverware set out in preparation for people to eat.
There's a shelf, a table, a plate, a cookpot, a silverware, a book, a candle, and a meat here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying a Ball and a Flower, and wielding a scepter.

            "desc": "It's spare and humble.  A small cookpot sits over a fire, and a few books sit on a shelf.  A candle sits in the middle of a table where there are a few plates and silverware set out in preparation for people to eat.",
            "extra_desc": "The servants' quarters were an afterthought, for the most part.  After all of the opulence that went into building the Castle itself, someone finally asked, \"but where will the servants live?\"  As it was, their quarters were tacked onto the side of the castle, out of view.",

data.short_motivation: I want to play a joke on the servants
data.mid_motivation: I think it would be hilarious to see the servants eat shoe stew and give them forks to eat the soup with
data.long_motivation: I am practicing new material to perform at the annual court gathering
